intro: COMMERCIALE4.0 is a community of mechanical companies. We revolutionize the way companies connect with each other, building the networking of the future! Join us! No fees or hidden costs.
stepHint: In order to complete the access, please follow the next steps.
pecHint: This inbox will be use only to certify the attendibility of the user
emailHint: This inbox will be use to receive informations related to the service
registerHint: In order to continue, confirm to accept the Privacy policy and Terms and conditions
completeHint: After "Complete registration", you will receive a confirmation message in your PEC inbox
createCompanyProfile: Create your company profile including photos, description, info, contacts and much more.
makeDetailResearch: Make detail research with the advantage of our TAG system! It's much easier to be found from other companies of the mechanical industry.
selectMainKeyword: Select the main keyword that represent your company.
title: Title
clickingDelete: Clicking the DELETE button, your profile won't be displayed anymore. Commerciale4.0, as interms and condition, will be saving the informations for internal use.
infoNotEditable: The displayed info are not editable
toVerifyYourAccount: to verify your account. Please check your email inbox to coutinue.
errorOccuredDelete: An error occured due to delete.
wantToDelete: Do you really want to delete?
wantToRemove: Do you really want to remove?
sentResetPassword: We've sent an email to reset your password. Please check your email inbox.
emailNotExist: The email address doesn't exist. Please enter the email corretly.
redirectHome: to be redirected to the homepage.
forgotPasswordMsg: When you fill in your registered email address, you will be sent instructions on how to reset your password.
intro1: is THE community of mechanical companies. We revolutionize the way companies connect with each other, building the networking of the future!
joinUs: Join us! No fees or hidden costs.
createPassword: You can create your password here.
notApproved: The account has not been approved yet.
postFailed: An error occured due to create a post.
